abstract: Comedian Colin Quinn, talks about his one-man show Colin Quinn: The New York Story, which is having sold-out crowds at Cherry Lane Theater.
lead_paragraph: The comedian and actor doesn’t need any prompting when it comes to finding something to complain about.

headline.main: Colin Quinn Can Find the Dark Cloud in a Silver Lining
headline.print_headline: Finding the Dark Cloud in a Silver Lining
